requirements.summary: Revert all frontend pages to Version 13 implementation
acceptanceCriteria: All frontend pages (Dashboard, Login, QuestionBank, AddQuestion, GeneratePaper, GeneratedPapers, PaperPreview) match their Version 13 implementation
All frontend components (Layout, StatsCard, WorkflowDiagram, PaperCard, PaperSection, QuestionCard, SubjectManager, EditQuestionModal) match their Version 13 implementation
All utility files, hooks, styles, and configuration files match their Version 13 state
No code changes introduced in Versions 14 through 20 remain in the frontend

file_operations.description: Revert Dashboard page to Version 13 implementation, restoring the original welcome banner, stats cards, system overview, and workflow diagram layout
Revert Login page to Version 13 implementation, restoring the original branding, feature highlights, and Internet Identity integration
Revert QuestionBank page to Version 13 implementation, restoring the original tabbed interface for questions and subjects with search and filter controls
Revert AddQuestion page to Version 13 implementation, restoring the original form for individual question entry and bulk CSV/JSON upload functionality
Revert GeneratePaper page to Version 13 implementation, restoring the original exam paper configuration form with subject selection and question count inputs
Revert GeneratedPapers page to Version 13 implementation, restoring the original list view of previously generated papers sorted by creation date
Revert PaperPreview page to Version 13 implementation, restoring the original paper preview with variant selection and PDF download functionality
Revert Layout component to Version 13 implementation, restoring the original sidebar navigation with navy-blue theme, navigation links, user display, and logout button
Revert StatsCard component to Version 13 implementation, restoring the original card design for displaying statistics with icons and gradient styles
Revert WorkflowDiagram component to Version 13 implementation, restoring the original horizontal step-by-step workflow visualization
Revert PaperCard component to Version 13 implementation, restoring the original summary card for generated exam papers
Revert PaperSection component to Version 13 implementation, restoring the original section display for exam questions with sequential numbering
Revert QuestionCard component to Version 13 implementation, restoring the original question display with badges, expandable options, and edit/delete actions
Revert SubjectManager component to Version 13 implementation, restoring the original UI for adding, editing, and deleting subjects
Revert EditQuestionModal component to Version 13 implementation, restoring the original modal dialog for editing questions with validation
Revert App root component to Version 13 implementation, restoring the original TanStack Router configuration with all page routes and AuthGuardedLayout
Revert useQueries hook to Version 13 implementation, restoring the original React Query hooks for CRUD operations on subjects, questions, and papers
Revert CSV parser utility to Version 13 implementation, restoring the original parsing logic for question imports with validation
Revert CSV template generator to Version 13 implementation, restoring the original sample CSV generation for question imports
Revert JSON parser utility to Version 13 implementation, restoring the original parsing logic for question imports with validation
Revert PDF generator utility to Version 13 implementation, restoring the original printable HTML exam paper generation
Revert URL parameters utility to Version 13 implementation, restoring the original query string and hash-based route parameter handling
Revert global stylesheet to Version 13 implementation, restoring the original Tailwind configuration with navy-blue academic theme and CSS custom properties
Revert Tailwind configuration to Version 13 implementation, restoring the original theme extensions with custom fonts, colors, and animations
